# VEHICLE::SET_USE_DESIRED_Z_CRUISE_SPEED_FOR_LANDING

## Summary
Makes helicopters use full desired cruise speed in Z axis to help land more accurately

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** val
